name: Lost (itch) (DanielJohnson)
description:
Note: This game is in very early development therefore there may be bugs in this version of the game. If you come across any bugs please leave them in the comments below so they can be fixed as fast as possible.

With the game still being in development this is not a full representation of what the final release will be like. For the final version of the game I hope to have implemented most of if not all of the following features:

  • Single Player Mode
  • Controller Support
  • Up to 4 Player Local Co-op
  • Music/Audio

If you have ideas or suggestions for how I could improve the game you can also let me know in the comments and I will take suggestions into consideration.
